nodejs.subtitle: Node.js
nodejs.about: Node.jsÂ® is a platform built on Chrome's JavaScript runtime for easily building fast, scalable network applications. Node.js uses an event-driven, non-blocking I/O model that makes it lightweight and efficient, perfect for data-intensive real-time applications that run across distributed devices.

videos.title: Introduction to Browserify
videos.description: Browserify is a tool that brings node.js style development to the browser.

videos.title: npm init
videos.description: The command npm init provides an interactive step-by-step interface for creating a package.json

videos.title: CommonJS Basics Introduction
videos.description: CoomonJS modules provide a clean syntax for importing dependencies. This lesson will take a look at the basics of using CommonJS modules.

videos.title: What are CommonJS Modules?
videos.description: CommonJS modules provide a clean way to import dependencies in JavaScript.

videos.title: Migrate to Express 4
videos.description: This lesson will explain some of the main breaking changes between Express 3 and Express 4.

videos.title: First API with Node.js, Express and MongoDB
videos.description: Learn how to import data into your MongoDB and then use Express to serve a simple Node.js API.

videos.title: Node.js + MongoDB
videos.description: A hangouts about using Node.js with MongoDB.

videos.title: Node Streams
videos.description: You've heard a lot about node streams, in this episode you get introduced to streams and see how to code up your own read, write, and transform stream.

videos.title: Introduction to Node.js
videos.description: What is Node.js and why might you want to use it?

videos.title: Node.js First Steps
videos.description: We'll learn out how to install Node.js, as well as how to maintain different Node versions using NVM. We'll also build a basic HTTP server.

videos.title: Modules
videos.description: Modules are the building blocks of Node.js applications. Find out how to use them and how to create your own.

videos.title: Packages and NPM
videos.description: Packages allow programmers to share their modules with the world. Find out how to use npm to install packages and manage package dependencies.

videos.title: Thinking Asynchronously
videos.description: This talk is about some common patterns and pitfalls for working in an asynchronous environment.

ruby.subtitle: Ruby
ruby.about: Ruby is a dynamic, open source programming language with a focus on simplicity and productivity. It has an elegant syntax that is natural to read and easy to write.

videos.title: Ruby Version Managers
videos.description: Techniques for installing Ruby and managing different versions between applications.

videos.title: Rails Application Structure
videos.description: A look into the files and folders inside every Rails application and how they fit together.

go.subtitle: Go
go.about: Go is an open source programming language that makes it easy to build simple, reliable, and efficient software.

videos.title: Getting Started with Go
videos.description: How to setup your environment and write a Hello World application using the Go programming language.

videos.title: Go Language Basics
videos.description: In this episode Jeremy covers the basics of variables, functions and loops in Go.

videos.title: Martini and Markdown
videos.description: In this episode Jeremy builds a simple Martini web application that parses and presents Markdown.

videos.title: Postgres: Basics
videos.description: In this episode Jeremy covers how to setup and connect to a Postgres database with Go.

videos.title: HTML Templates
videos.description: Jeremy makes his books output prettier by using Bootstrap and HTML Templates.

videos.title: Postgres: Inserting Data
videos.description: Jeremy continues with his Martini web application and adds the ability to insert book data into the database.

videos.title: Auth: Part 1
videos.description: Jeremy covers basic authentication with Martini.

videos.title: Auth: Part 2
videos.description: Jeremy covers basic authentication with Martini.

videos.title: Auth: Part 3
videos.description: Jeremy covers basic authentication with Martini.
